message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $15,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still not convinced that $18,000 is a good price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $16,000. Can you consider that?
